intro: Survive harsh nights and unpredictable airport dangers.
description:
Stranded in an international airport with no documents, no money, and nowhere to go—you must survive in the shadows of modern travel. In Life in Terminal Simulator, you take on the role of a forgotten passenger trapped in a terminal, where each day is a struggle to find food, rest, and a path to freedom.
Your goal? Earn enough to buy a forged passport… and escape.

Features:
– Time & Action Management
Each day offers a limited number of actions. New tasks appear daily, and the airport environment shifts with time—making planning essential.
– Survival Mechanics
Sleep in unsafe storage rooms, risk getting robbed at night, and monitor your hunger and thirst. Food and water are scarce—and expensive.
– NPC Interaction & Quests
Talk to other lost souls and airport workers. Accept jobs, trade, and uncover hidden ways to earn money or unlock restricted areas.
– Location Access & Exploration
Gain access to new sections of the airport by completing objectives or paying off the right people. Every corner could offer an opportunity—or danger.
– Risk of Theft
Your possessions aren’t safe. Sleep in the wrong place, and you may wake up with nothing. Carefully manage your valuables and shelter choices.
– Resource Strategy
Juggle your energy, food, hydration, and money wisely. One poor decision could cost you days of progress.
– The Final Escape
Your ultimate objective is clear: save up enough to buy a fake passport and finally leave the terminal behind. But in a world of limited choices, will you make the right ones?

Not all travelers are tourists. Some are survivors.
Can you outlast the system and escape the terminal… or will you become just another ghost in the airport?
